Name: Bamboo Cocktail (Boothby's 1908 recipe)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Nick & Nora glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist (discarded) & Fragata Green Olive - preferably pimiento-stuffed ('pimola' olive).
Review: This bone dry cocktail makes for a great apéritif, but you may find the Bamboo 'Perfect' version of this cocktail easier going.
History: Adapted from a recipe in William T. Boothby 's 1908 World Drinks and How to Mix Them . Bamboo Cocktail history .
Nutrition: One serving of Bamboo Cocktail (Boothby's 1908 recipe) contains 91 calories
